title: Subway Gift Cards in NE
body:
Hey.
I found that in Nordic and East region i can´t use subway gift cards.
_We got subway stores in Czech Republic_
****
Is it that i can´t use it as a payment option or a "_Bug?_"

_Thank you_

**Vezerit** 
_I´m the shadow in the darkness_ {{champion:238}}

replies.body:
The payment method that converts Subway cards to RP is called *Openbucks*, which is available **on the NA server only**. You can find our breakdown on this in our [FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753254-Cash-and-Gift-Cards-Openbucks-)

Let me know if you have any questions.
